vsParam:
Wh-what's wrong, Lydie?
Why are you sighing looking at your wallet...

What!? Ah, you saw that...
Here's the thing. I just remembered something in Merveille...

Merveille...
That's the place you come from, right?

Yes... It's quite embarrassing.
Our atelier was not frequently visited by people...

And our father kept spending. He always bought
useless things. We had to struggle to make ends meet.

He's tireless in buying fancy brushes and canvases... The money
he spent on those things could sustain us for days... Ho ho ho...

Such agonizing memories!
Get rid of them, Lydie!

Ah! I'm sorry. A-anyway...
It just occurred to me that it'd be great if I had more money...

Hmm, I see... Although it may not be a proper job,
why don't you try to make some money while staying here?

The currency here may be different...
But coins are made of metals. I think they can be sold for money.

This is a rather bold plan...
But I think it might work.

Alright.
I hope that this could help Lydie.

Guys... Please listen to me,
I have a favor to ask of you...

Can you fetch a lot of water for me?
I have an idea!

Water? Uh, we can do that...
But what are you up to...

Oh, so much water!
Thanks, guys, that will be enough!
So much water... What are you going to with it?

Ho ho ho, well...
Come here please!

Yes,
Hazel helped me set it up!

You got a strong initiative and execution.
So, this is?

Yes!
I plan to sell water here!

Hee hee, when we had no money in Merveille,
we'd sell water to pay for food and clothing!

Gee, that's... really a sad story...
But...

Boo-hoo, why?
How come nobody's buying...

Ha ha... I guess that's because water is abundant here.
You can get tasty water anywhere for free.

So...
No one would buy water...

So... If you want to make money,
you got to come up with another idea...

H-how come...
Boo-hoo, life in this world is so tough...
